mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as num, frm.* from ( SELECT seq_no, service_type, cen_no, cate_no, product_name, detail, price, status, ref_seq_no, is_del, reg_user, reg_dt, upd_user, upd_dt FROM af_fixregs
ORDER BY reg_dt DESC ) frm ) where num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT count(seq_no) as totalCnt FROM af_fixregs

SELECT a.seq_no, a.service_type, b.cen_no, b.cen_name, c.cate_no, d.type_id, d.type_name, e.brand_id, e.brand_name, a.product_name, a.detail, a.price, a.status, a.ref_seq_no, a.is_del FROM af_fixregs a, af_centers b, af_categorys c, af_types d, af_brands e WHERE a.seq_no = #{seqNo} AND a.cen_no = b.cen_no AND a.cate_no = c.cate_no AND c.type_id = d.type_id AND c.brand_id = e.brand_id AND a.is_del = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO af_fixregs ( seq_no, service_type, cen_no, cate_no, product_name, detail, price, status, ref_seq_no, is_del, reg_user, reg_dt, upd_user, upd_dt ) VALUES ( SEQ_AF_FIXREGS.NEXTVAL, #{serviceType}, #{cenNo}, #{cateNo}, #{productName}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{status}, #{refSeqNo}, 'N', #{regUser}, sysdate, #{updUser}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE af_fixregs SET service_type = #{serviceType}, cen_no = #{cenNo}, cate_no = #{cateNo}, product_name = #{productName}, detail = #{detail}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, upd_user = #{updUser}, upd_dt = sysdate WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
UPDATE af_fixregs SET status = 'CANCELED', upd_user = #{updUser}, upd_dt = sysdate WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
UPDATE af_fixregs SET is_del = 'Y', upd_user = #{updUser}, upd_dt = sysdate WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
